plot: Santiago Torres' journey takes him from the polo fields of California to Argentina, Florida, New York and Mexico. Behind thrilling sports action is a deeply moving human story.
title: The Polo Kid
plot_es: Santiago Torres' journey takes him from the polo fields of California to Argentina, Florida, New York and Mexico. Behind thrilling sports action is a deeply moving human story.
plot_en: Santiago Torres' journey takes him from the polo fields of California to Argentina, Florida, New York and Mexico. Behind thrilling sports action is a deeply moving human story.
